KinectProject
A shell for creating projects using projectors and kinects
  • Main Page

Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AppBasic app that you inherit from for your app
EnableableSimple interface for elements you can enable and disable
KinectWrapper for a kinect device and its position in the real world
KinectGuiGui for configuring/calibrating kinects
ModelRepresents the physical surfaces to project onto in the scene
PlaneRepresents a plane in 3d space, and helps with slicing images out of a kinect. Uses the equation Ax + By + Cz + D = 0
ProjectedRectThis is a texture that will wrap itself onto a 3d model
ProjectorRepresents an actual projector in the scene Started using ofNode, but not complete - rotation isn't implemented yet
SceneRepresents the real world setup of physical surfaces, the projectors in the scene, and the Kinects
SceneGuiThe gui for arranging cameras and kinects
util::ScopedGLCapabilityThis calls glEnable/disable while the object is in scope, and then returns openGL to its previous state when the destructor is called
util::SettingsProvides a persistent settings interface for stuff not in the GUI
